author: John S
title: Boutique hotel right next to Jardin du Luxembourg
text: Hotel Recamier is a boutique hotel with a narrow facade and several stories high. The room I stayed in was small (standard by Paris standards) however beautifully fitted out. There is a small lounge downstairs where they serve breakfast or you can sit and relax. The location is a short stroll to to Boulevarde Saint Germain and right near the Garden du Luxembourg. A classy little hotel and definitely worth considering.
